### Favorite Books | ![We Are Not Free](https://images.gr-assets.com/books/1565710970l/49934666.jpg){width="120"} | ![This Place Is Still Beautiful](https://images.gr-assets.com/books/1634238514l/58984692.jpg){width="120"} | ![The Silence That Binds Us](https://images.gr-assets.com/books/1641068252l/59028585.jpg){width="120"} | ![Daughters of Shandong](https://images-na.ssl-images-amazon.com/images/S/compressed.photo.goodreads.com/books/1740179056i/223329042.jpg){width="120"} | ![The Kite Runner](https://images-na.ssl-images-amazon.com/images/S/compressed.photo.goodreads.com/books/1541428344i/17165596.jpg){width="120"} | |---|---|---|---|---| | ![Permanent Record](https://images.gr-assets.com/books/1564666396l/46223297.jpg){width="120"} | ![Ace](https://images.gr-assets.com/books/1580804471l/52128695.jpg){width="120"} | ![Minor Feelings](https://images-na.ssl-images-amazon.com/images/S/compressed.photo.goodreads.com/books/1580788273l/52845775.jpg){width="120"} | ![Quiet Power](https://images-na.ssl-images-amazon.com/images/S/compressed.photo.goodreads.com/books/1328562861i/8520610.jpg){width="120"} | ![Before The Coffee Gets Cold](https://images.gr-assets.com/books/1704153539l/44421460.jpg){width="120"} | | ![XOXO](https://images-na.ssl-images-amazon.com/images/S/compressed.photo.goodreads.com/books/1602086642i/54618808.jpg){width="120"} | ![Shine](https://images-na.ssl-images-amazon.com/images/S/compressed.photo.goodreads.com/books/1580350020i/50855956.jpg){width="120"} | ![Miss Peregrine's Home for Peculiar Children](https://images.gr-assets.com/books/1623449170l/9460487.jpg){width="120"} | ![These Violent Delights](https://images-na.ssl-images-amazon.com/images/S/compressed.photo.goodreads.com/books/1580958058i/50892212.jpg){width="120"} | ![The Lightning Thief](https://images-na.ssl-images-amazon.com/images/S/compressed.photo.goodreads.com/books/1400602609i/28187.jpg){width="120"} | ### Favorite Comics I’ve read a ton of X-Men over the years. Besides just the powers and fight scenes, I really love how it reflects real-world struggles faced by marginalized communities by being an analogy to the Civil Rights Movement, with Magneto and Professor X being a parallel Malcolm X and Martin Luther King Jr. I love the series so much that I used to have a whole screenshot collection of some of my favorite X-Men moments, but it got lost somewhere along the way. So here’s to starting fresh and rebuilding the archive. ::: {style="overflow-x: auto; white-space: nowrap; padding: 10px; border-radius: 8px"} ::: {.cell} ::: {.cell-output-display} ```{=html}
